info.name: Edit API
info.description: A collection of JSON video and image edit templates for the Shotstack API.

request.description:
# HTML Lower Third

Create a lower third text area with a decorative coloured bar on the left hand side. The container table expands as the text increases/wraps.

![Lower thirds HTML example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ef4b75db-5856-4df2-acda-2ed26c38263f.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/9edec592-ea7b-47e4-9532-51805ebd4401.mp4)

<!--
{
  "video": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/9edec592-ea7b-47e4-9532-51805ebd4401.mp4",
  "description": "Create a lower third text area with a decorative coloured bar on the left hand side. The container table expands as the text increases/wraps.",
  "type": "video"
}
-->

item.name: Multilingual
item.description: Add text using the language of your choice.

item.name: Transforms
item.description: Modify clips using rotate, skew and transform.
